overview: Cia (Dinda Surbakti) and Ali (Jeyhan Kler) face a steep road in attaining their love. Cia, Petta Lolo's daughter, falls in love with Ali. When love becomes so deep, Cia knows that Ali is the brother of the woman who committed suicide because Cia’s brother married another woman. There is no blessing from both families. It’s fortunate that Cia and Ali have faithful friends: Ati (Nur Fadillah), Rio (Ikram Noer), and Mamak Ramlah (Husen) who always give advice and support. Yet Cia and Ali chose to elope which is also called silariang in South Sulawesi. Knowing his daughter silariang with Ali, Daeng Mariolo (Syahriar Tattoo) becomes furious. His family agrees to seek them both. Siri (self esteem) must be upheld.
title: Silariang: Reaching Out for Eternal Love
